attributes.action: Give the People, National Referenda on EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the people request referenda on exiting or staying within political Europe.

The government has lied to the electorate about the Lisbon Treaty.
This document is a self amending treaty, without the peoples mandate the government has committed Treason against the nation for which, PM Gordon Brown & MP David Miliband should be Impeachment and removed from office.

This country belongs to the people. It's for the people to decide their futures not MP's 

Let democracy prevail. Without referenda democracy is dead

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
